boardgame.name: Kashgar: Händler der Seidenstraße
Kashgar: Merchants of the Silk Road
boardgame.description: In Kashgar: H_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;auml;ndler der Seidenstra_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;szlig;e, the players trade different spices that are coming over the silk road from Asia to Europe. Each player has control over three caravans. In the beginning, each caravan consists of three cards that are spread out vertically so that the top part of each card is visible; each card stands for a caravan member with different abilities._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;On his turn, a player performs only one action, choosing one of the cards on top of the three families and executing one action shown on that card. Then the card is put at the back of its caravan. To use the same caravan member again, a player must first use all the other cards on top of that caravan row._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;These actions can influence the player's stock of spice, gold and mules. To keep track of that stock, each player has his own board with wooden markers that are moved accordingly. Actions can also bring new members to the caravans and can enable the player to fulfill one of four delivery request cards from the middle of the table. Finally, there are actions that mix things up a bit, such as by getting rid of a caravan member or even influencing other players' caravans._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The game ends when one player has earned 25 points by collecting character cards and fulfilling delivery request cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The core mechanism of Kashgar could be called _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;open deck-building_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;. The game plays quickly with little downtime. After having learned the different actions of the cards, players can start trying out different strategies and combinations of caravan members, caravan sizes, etc._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

I´m offering the german edition by KOSMOS shipping rates: Germany = 4,5 Euro EU countries = 15 Euro worldwide = 19 Euro game weight: 1000 gramms

The game: Kosmos (c) 2013. GERMAN EDITION! All game materials are still in mint condition. Shipping: All shipping is done via DHL. Shipping costs depend on size and weight of the parcel and destination. Payment: Within EU I prefer the EU-standard-bank-tranfer (SEPA,IBAN/BIC). It is fast and causes no fees. Outside EU Paypal and bank-transfer are possible.
Kosmos German First Edition German copy of the game with English translation paste-ups applied to sleeves. From a smoke-free, but pet-friendly home.

Shipping, without tracking: 4 EUR for Germany, 9 EUR in the EU, 17 EUR worldwide. Shipping, with tracking: 5 EUR for Germany, 11.50 EUR in the EU, 20.50 EUR worldwide. Payment via SEPA bank transfer is free. PayPal payment as a gift is free (so you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ll pay the fees for this), otherwise +3 EUR for PayPal payment. If you buy multiple items from me, then there is a shipping discount, of course!

The game was just played just twice and is still in mint condition. My household is smoke free. Payment via PayPal or direct bank transfer. For foreign shipping please contact me before buying.

The game is unplayed / in new condition. The components and the rules are in German. Shipping costs with DHL will be 6€ within Germany, 16€ within the EU. Paypal (+1€ Paypal fee) or bank transfer possible (IBAN / BIC). For other shipping locations, please contact me before buying.

This is for English cards ONLY, to convert the game from the original German. A full set of English cards (poker sized) is included, which I had printed via Artscow.com. They are very professional prints and largely indistinguishable from the original cards. NB. You would also need a copy of the boxed German game if you wanted the resource tracking player boards and the wooden tokens, but theoretically if you had something else to use as resources you could play the game with just these cards alone. Postage is an additional £3.50 in the UK. International postage available on request.

German edition w/ english paste ups Game is in very good condition and has been verified as complete. This game was never released in the US so the cards and rules are in GERMAN. However, English paste ups have been printed on Avery sticker paper and applied directly onto the cards which were then sleeved. An English translation of the rules are included as well. Box has a little storage wear but is in very good shape. Plastic storage tray/box insert is also included
Includes English translation of rules. Cards have stickers with English paste-ups. Cards are sleeved with Ultra Pro sleeves. Game was never played.
